solution_line_template: After the birds ate {eaten_by_birds} of the tomatoes Haruto has {initial_tomatoes} - {eaten_by_birds} = <<{initial_tomatoes}-{eaten_by_birds}={tomatoes_after_birds}>>{tomatoes_after_birds} tomatoes left.
After giving half of his tomatoes to his friend, Haruto had {tomatoes_after_birds} / {given_away_divisor} = <<{tomatoes_after_birds}/{given_away_divisor}={tomatoes_left}>>{tomatoes_left} tomatoes.
